DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect nasal oronasal interface ASV treatment sleep efficiency sleep architecture . Therefore , patient start treatment ASV , randomize two group . In first group , patient use nasal interface first night oronasal interface second night . In second group , patient use oronasal mask first nasal mask second night . The result trial major impact future clinical practice would deliver prediction rule choose correct interface immediately .
DOC.criteria: Patients central sleep apnea , respond treatment CPAP Indication treatment ASV Patients < 18 year old
